Package xing.base

Class AsexualSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • xing.base.adapter.SolverAdapter<AsexualSolution>
      • xing.base.AsexualSolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable, Progressive, Solver<AsexualSolution>
    public class AsexualSolver
extends SolverAdapter<AsexualSolution>

    General framework to handle AsexualSolution.

    To use the solver framework, one should define as minimum:

    • How solution should reproduce (see AsexualSolution interface)
    • Factory classes to produce Solutions
    • Sampler classes and corresponding factories to generate the samplers , which is used to control how parent generation is sampled
    • Default implementation for some preset samplers are available. (see xing.sampler)

    An example workflow:

     
 // Suppose the follow factories have been user implemented
 UserSolutionFactory solutionFact = new UserSolutionFactory();
 UserSolutionPoolFactory poolFact = new UserSolutionPoolFactory();
 RandomEngine rng = new RandomEngine(0);

 // Initialise pool size to be 100
 AsexualSolver solver = new AsexualSolver(100, poolFact, solutionFact, rng);

 // Setup how parent generations should be sampled
 ParentSamplerFactory parentPolicy = new ParentSamplerFactory();
 solver.setParentPolicy(parentPolicy);

 // Optionally, depending on different algorithm requirement, one may
 // wish to setup surviverPolicy, e.g.:
 // solver.surviverPolicy(someSamplerFactory);
 
 UserSolution solution = solver.solve(200); // run for 200 iterations

    • Constructor Detail

      • AsexualSolver

        public AsexualSolver​(int poolSize,
                     SolutionPool.Factory<AsexualSolution> poolFact,
                     Solution.Factory<AsexualSolution> solutionFact,
                     RandomEngine rng)
        Construct the solver.
        Parameters:
        poolSize - initial size of the solution pool
        poolFact - factory class that allocate a solution pool instance
        solutionFact - factory class that generates initial solutions
        rng - a random engine instance that will be used during evolution of the solutions

    • Method Detail

      • setParentPolicy

        public void setParentPolicy​(int N,
                            SolutionSampler.Factory<AsexualSolution> policy)
        Defines how parent generation should be sampled from a solution pool. The sampler is constructed exactly once every iteration.
        Parameters:
        N - number of candidate to select to reproduce
        policy - a factory policy that generates a sampler instance.
